A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A complete disservice to the franchise. I don't know what critics are trying to pull\, but this movie was garbage. A pinnacle of human garbage. \nSome may argue that its just a movie and to take it at face value; that's fine. However\, movies are supposed to entertain us and this installment does anything but. I really wanted to like TLJ\, but I cannot. If I could rate any lower\, I would. 0/5.
